sourcesContent:
<template lang="pug">
  .list
    .list__wrapper(v-if="index === 0")
      .list__wrapper__content.list__wrapper__content--title Pokemon Name
      .list__wrapper__content.list__wrapper__content--title You Own
    .list__wrapper
      .list__wrapper__content {{ pokemon.name }}
      .list__wrapper__content 0
</template>

<script>
export default {
  name: "list",
  props: {
    pokemon: {
      type: Object,
      required: true
    },
    index: {
      type: Number,
      required: false,
      default: 1
    },
    perPage: {
      type: Number,
      required: false,
      default: 10
    }
  }
};
</script>

<style lang="scss" scoped>
.list {
  padding: .5em;
  color: $black;
  &:nth-child(even) {
    background-color: $white-blueish;
  }
  &:nth-child(odd) {
    background-color: $white;
  }
  &__wrapper {
    display: flex;
    justify-content: flex-start;
    flex-wrap: wrap;
    &__content {
      display: flex;
      align-items: center;
      width: 50%;
      &:nth-child(2) {
        padding: 0 calc(.5em + 15px);
      }
    }
  }
}
</style>
